entry.title: Sparkfun tutorial: Solder stenciling
entry.content:
Sparkfun sometimes posts very useful tutorials on skills related to tinkering with electronics. This time they made a video tutorial on using a stencil to solder SMD components on a PCB. I find it quite useful, even for very small volumes (starting 5-10).<div>
<iframe title="YouTube video player" width="560" height="349" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/WDIqtGMROjM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe></div><div>
</div><div>If you are not the lucky owner of a laser cutter, there are many websites that offer to produce the stencil for you like www.ohararp.com for reasonable prices.</div><div>
</div><div style="text-align: right;">Source</div>
